header.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
header.description: Yuji Itadori is a high school student who becomes a host for a powerful curse. He joins a school of sorcerers to learn how to control his new powers.

list.title: Haikyuu!!
list.description: Shoyo Hinata is determined to play volleyball despite being short. After seeing a player nicknamed the Little Giant, he trains to become a great player.

list.title: Black Lagoon
list.description: Rokurou Okajima is a businessman who is captured by a mercenary group. He decides to join them after seeing how corrupt his company is.

list.title: Yu Yu Hakusho
list.description: Yusuke Urameshi is a delinquent who is killed while saving a child. He is given a chance to come back to life as a Spirit Detective.

list.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
list.description: Follow the Joestar family as they fight supernatural beings using their unique abilities.
